description: Implement neuroscience-inspired memory system (8 phases): bookmarks (awake ripples, salience-scored), knowledge decay tracking with staleness indicators, consolidation rhythm advisory at 5+ sessions, warm knowledge tier in snapshot (7-day recency + tag-overlap heuristic), contextual triggers with auto-expiry, transcript distillation (pure Node.js structural JSONL filter), sleep history (SleepHistoryEntry, sleep_history[] LIFO), and system flow core file (core/6.system_flow.md). New commands: bookmark add/list/clear, trigger add/list/remove, transcript distill, knowledge touch, sleep history. Fixed freshDefaults() shared-reference bug in readSleepState. 48 new tests (384 total, 383 passing).

Enhance Kanban task filters: added status filter dropdown, text search (searches name + description), and date range filter with field selector (created_at/updated_at). Filter state persisted via usePersistedState hook (localStorage prefix: agentcontext:). Clear Filters button with active-count badge. FilterState interface exported from TaskFilters.tsx; applyFilters() in KanbanBoard.tsx handles all filter logic.

Fix selectedTask stale snapshot bug in KanbanBoard. Replaced storing a full Task object in React state with storing selectedSlug (string | null) and deriving the task via useMemo from live TanStack Query data. Detail panel now reflects post-mutation state automatically. 325 tests passing.

Polish dashboard UI: animated radial brand gradient background with subtle-pulse animation, stagger entrance animations for Kanban columns (slide-up-fade with cubic-bezier spring), CSS refinements across Header, Sidebar, Shell, KanbanColumn, TaskCard, TaskCreateModal, TaskDetailPanel, TaskFilters, CorePage, FeaturesPage, SleepPage, tokens. 325 tests passing.

Build release discovery system: src/lib/release-discovery.ts auto-discovers unreleased tasks, features, and changelog entries. New CLI commands: releases add --yes (non-interactive, auto-includes all unreleased items), releases list, releases show. 3 new API routes (GET /api/releases/unreleased, GET /api/releases/:version, POST /api/releases). release-backpopulate.ts sets released_version on features. Snapshot shows Latest Release section (changelog limit lowered from 5 to 3). 13 unit + 10 integration tests added; 325 total passing.

Update README and DEEP-DIVE: added Dashboard nav link, interactive mode mention, expanded Mermaid lifecycle diagram (features/changelog/releases in store, dashboard in capture), full Dashboard section with usage and design notes, releases add --yes and releases list/show commands, release auto-discovery explanation, Dashboard command subsection, SubagentStart briefing in hook flow diagram.

Enrich SubagentStart briefing with full project structure context. Briefing now includes: system structure explanation (soul/user/memory/extended/features purpose), extended core files index, features listing (name, status, why snippet, related tasks), knowledge index, and prioritized usage instructions ('Check feature PRDs first'). 4 new tests; 301 tests passing.

Add SQL ER diagram preview for 5.data_structures.sql in core file viewer. sql-parser.ts extracts entities, fields (enum/array/boolean/nullable/date type inference), and FK relationships from CREATE TABLE and comment-based schemas. SqlPreview.tsx renders entity cards in CSS grid with SVG bezier curves and arrowheads. CorePage.tsx shows File/Preview tab toggle for SQL files; Preview is default.

Add field-level change tracking to change-tracker.ts. FieldChange interface with from/to values added to DashboardChange. Net-change detection: A->B->A entries cancelled (removed), A->B->C folded to A->C. Append-only actions and entries without fields bypass detection. Routes (tasks, knowledge, core, sleep) now capture old values before mutation. 19 new unit tests.

Add comprehensive error handling: ErrorBoundary class component in App.tsx, res.ok checks before res.json() in API client, isError states on all 5 pages, mutation error feedback with 5s auto-dismiss in TaskDetailPanel, isPending disables insert/changelog buttons. Server hardening: 1MB body size limit with req.destroy() on overflow, graceful shutdown on SIGINT/SIGTERM with 5s force-exit, 30s socket timeout. 274 tests passing.

Fix race condition in sleep done where parallel sessions finishing during consolidation lost their records. Implemented epoch-based filtering: sleep_started_at timestamp added to SleepState, new sleep start command records epoch, sleep done only clears sessions/changes from before the epoch. Post-epoch records survive for the next consolidation cycle. Backward compatible when sleep start is not called.

Make tasks create fully non-interactive. --description defaults to task name, --priority defaults to medium. New --status flag (todo/in_progress/completed, default todo) and --tags flag (comma-separated). Invalid status values produce a validation error. Agents can now create tasks without interactive prompts blocking execution.

Fix inquirer highlight styling bug where the full menu line was colored instead of only the item name. Root cause: style.highlight receives '  ' + name (cursor + space prefix), so Map key lookups failed silently. Fix: slice(2) strips the 2-char prefix before lookup, result wrapped with chalk.bgHex('#581C87') background fill. Focused items now show purple background fill; unfocused show category-colored label.

Rewrite closed memory section: no longer claims agents cannot see/edit platform memory. Now frames friction as the real lock-in: platform dependency grows over time, workarounds exist but should not be necessary. Added bold punchline formatting throughout for scannability.

Add 'agentcontext dashboard' command. Node.js native HTTP server (zero new runtime deps) with 17 REST API endpoints covering tasks, sleep, core, knowledge, features, changelog, and health. React 19 + Vite 6 SPA with Kanban board (drag-drop, filter, sort, group), task CRUD, sleep state page, core file editor with markdown preview, knowledge manager with pin/unpin, and features PRD viewer. Design system: purple-magenta brand tokens (#641787 to #db04b4), Visby CF font, 4px grid, light/dark mode, i18n-ready (English). Change tracker records every mutating API call to .sleep.json dashboard_changes, cleared on sleep done. Build: npm run build = build:dashboard (Vite) + build:cli (tsup); tsup copies dashboard/dist to dist/dashboard. SleepState extended with dashboard_changes field. 258 tests passing.

Add SubagentStart hook support. 'hook subagent-start' outputs JSON with hookSpecificOutput.additionalContext containing a lightweight context briefing (~25 lines) for sub-agents: project summary (120 char cap), directory structure, active tasks, knowledge index, pinned knowledge, and usage instructions. generateSubagentBriefing() added to snapshot.ts with shared getActiveTaskLines() helper. install-skill registers SubagentStart hook in .claude/settings.json (no matcher, fires for all sub-agents including our own, 5s timeout). SubagentStart JSON format differs from SessionStart plain text output. Briefing deliberately excludes soul/user/memory, sleep state, changelog, features detail. 10 new integration tests; 246 tests passing.

Remove coderegistry command entirely. Deleted src/cli/commands/coderegistry.ts and src/templates/init/6.code_registry.json. Removed all references from index.ts, interactive.ts, init.ts. Rationale: static code registries go stale immediately when methods are renamed or moved; native Grep/Glob tools serve discovery better. Commands: 10 to 9. Tests: 246 passing.

Enrich features section of snapshot with Why, related_tasks, and latest changelog entry per feature. Reads ## Why markdown section (first non-placeholder line, capped 120 chars), surfaces related_tasks from frontmatter, shows most recent non-creation changelog entry. Uses existing readSection from src/lib/markdown.ts. 2 integration tests added (225 total).

Add hook-based sleep debt auto-tracking. 'hook stop' records session_id and transcript_path to .sleep.json (Stop hook). 'hook session-start' replaces raw 'agentcontext snapshot': analyzes previous session transcript for Write/Edit tool uses, auto-scores debt (1-3 changes +1, 4-8 +2, 9+ +3), injects graduated consolidation directives (debt 7-9 suggestion, debt 10+ critical block), then outputs snapshot. SleepState extended with last_session_id and last_transcript_path. Spread-merge backward compat for old .sleep.json. install-skill migrates existing SessionStart hooks. 50MB transcript cap. 31 new tests (221 total passing).

Add Smart Snapshot: knowledge index section surfaces slug + description + tags for every knowledge file (buildKnowledgeIndex in src/lib/knowledge-index.ts). Pinned knowledge files (pinned: true frontmatter) get full content loaded â€” zero agent tool calls. Extended core files index section surfaces names/types of core/[3-9]* files. Knowledge files are no longer invisible after write.

Add `agentcontext knowledge index` subcommand with --tag filter and --plain output mode. Add `agentcontext knowledge tags` subcommand listing 12 standard tags. Add pinned field to knowledge create and template. Standard tags: architecture, api, frontend, backend, database, devops, security, testing, design, decisions, onboarding, domain.

Add persistent sleep state tracking via `agentcontext sleep` command (status, add, done, debt subcommands). Sleep state stored in state/.sleep.json and surfaced in snapshot output between Active Tasks and Recent Changelog. Includes readJsonObject/writeJsonObject utilities in json-file.ts.

Strip list/read/search/update subcommands from core, tasks, features, knowledge, and coderegistry. Agents use native Read/Edit/Write tools for direct file access; CLI is reserved for structural operations only. Test count reduced from 203 to 162 (all passing).
Rewrote README with true motivation (token-burning search spiral), brain-region mapping, RemSleep lifecycle diagram, and why existing solutions break
Agent context initialized
